price: Kae Ɛda no a (Nyankopͻn) bεfrε wͻn aka akyerε wͻn sε: ”Mmuaeε bεn na mode maa Asomafoͻ no?”
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu mādhā ajabtumu al-mur'salīna
